target.name: ant-usage
target.description: simply execute 'ant' to discover the most useful targets.

echo.message: Useful ant commands for the Jitsi Project...
'ant rebuild' for a safe clean/build sequence
'ant rebuild run' for a safe clean/build/run
'ant run' to run the last build (use with care!)
'ant test' to run the tests over the last build
'ant rebuild test' for safe clean/build/test sequence
'ant make test' for incremental build/test sequence

target.name: clean
target.description: Remove all generated files and prepare for a clean build.

javadoc.author: true
javadoc.header: Jitsi: the OpenSource Java VoIP and Instant Messaging client.
javadoc.bottom:
Jitsi, the OpenSource Java VoIP and Instant Messaging client.
Distributable under LGPL license.

target.name: make
target.description: Incremental compile and package the project.

target.name: rebuild
target.description: Clean and make the project (including bundles).

fail.message: ${test.accounts.properties.file} not found - did you copy the template?
${test.local.properties.file} not found - did you copy the template?

target.name: test
target.description: Starts felix and runs selected Service Impl Compatibility Kits.

target.name: run-simple-tests
target.description: runs selected non-felix tests under junit.

target.name: run
target.description: Starts felix and runs sip-comunicator gui (use latest build).

target.name: run-with-profiler
target.description: Starts felix and runs sip-comunicator gui (use latest build) with the hooked classloader.

target.name: run-v4
target.description: Starts SC with a preference for IPv4.

target.name: profile
target.fail: This target can only run inside the NetBeans IDE.

target.name: cc-buildloop
target.description: Comprehensive (paranoid) rebuild and test (used by Cruise Control).

attribute.name: Import-Package

attribute.name: Bundle-Description
